short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add the GC ezproxy to the website URL to ease access to library accessible content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add the GC ezproxy prefix to the website URL to ease access to library accessible content. A valid CUNY Graduate Center login is necessary to use this.
